question_text: Which of the following are typical characteristics of a SaaS product? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Accessed through a web-based front end
Requires no development team to maintain the app
Users must manage the virtual machine it runs on
The application provider handles all software updates
correct_answer: Accessed through a web-based front end
Requires no development team to maintain the app
The application provider handles all software updates
explanation: SaaS products are ready-to-use, web-accessible, and fully managed by the provider.
